name: Date My Ride
tag_list: dating, online-dating, free-online-dating, free-dating, dating-site, dating-website, free-dating-website, free-dating-site, my-ride, pimp-my-ride, my-car, my-date, date, online-date, free-online-date, singles, search-for-date, match, personals, online-per
description: Free and fun online dating website
overview:
Date My Ride is the world’s largest free dating website for car enthusiasts. Our site is a perfect solution when choosing a date based on the car she or he drives.

For many of us the first date or in this case car date starts when you leave the house and walk down to the car waiting at the curb. Dozens of thoughts flash through your mind in those few seconds while you’re walking towards that car: “Wow, nice ride! He was cute in the picture, but the car……OMG?! Is that a Pinto? Didn’t they stop making those 100 years ago?!” After all, some of us still judge a book by its cover. In the dating world your car can kill or seal the deal.

Datemyride.com is unique and different because of its simple concept. The idea is to choose the mate you are looking for based on the type of car they drive. What if you want to meet a “big shot”? Then look for people driving a Mercedes, Bentley or Ferrari. If you want to find a “flower girl” look for a woman driving Volkswagen Beetle. Or maybe you love pickup trucks and want to meet somebody who likes them as well? It’s up to your imagination on how do you search for a date. Just remember, Date My Ride is a free and fun way of meeting your ride mate. So don’t hesitate and join us on this exciting joy ride now!
